text: George Baker, MBE (1 April 19317 October 2011) was an English actor and writer. He was best known for playing Tiberius in I, Claudius, and Inspector Wexford in The Ruth Rendell Mysteries. He was born in Varna, Bulgaria. Baker died on 7 October 2011 in West Lavington, Wiltshire from pneumonia after suffering a stroke, aged 80. ==Other websites== * Category:1931 births Category:2011 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Deaths from stroke Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:English stage actors Category:20th-century English writers Category:Actors who played in James Bond movies Category:21st-century English writers
title: George Baker (actor)
